Verses: 1 ippadiyirukka, Karththar Dhayaiyullavarenpadhai Neengal Rusipaarththadhundaanaal,
2 sagala Dhurkgunaththaiyum, Sagalavidha Kabadaththaiyum, Vanjagangalaiyum, Poraamaigalaiyum, Sagalavidha Purangoorudhalaiyum Ozhiththuvittu,
3 neengal Valarumpadi, Pudhidhaaip Pirandha Kuzhandhaigalaippola, Thiruvasanamaagiya Kalangamillaadha Gnaanappaalinmel Vaanjaiyaayirungal.
4 manusharaal Thallappattadhaayinum, Dhevanaal Therindhukollappattadhum Vilaiyerappetradhumaayirukkira Jeevanulla Kallaagiya Avaridaththil Serndhavargalaagiya Neengalum,

5 jeevanulla Karkalaippola Aavikketra Maaligaiyaagavum, Yesukiristhu Moolamaai Dhevanukkup Piriyamaana Aavikketra Paligalaich Seluththumpadikkup Parisuththa Aasaariyakkoottamaagavum Kattappattuvarugireergal.

6 andhappadiye: Idho, Therindhukollappattadhum Vilaiyerappetradhumaayirukkira Moolaikkallaich Seeyonil Vaikkiren; Adhinmel Visuvaasamaayirukkiravan Vetkappaduvadhillai Endru Vedhaththile Solliyirukkiradhu.

7 aagaiyaal Visuvaasikkira Ungalukku Adhu Vilaiyerappetradhu; Keezhppadiyaamalirukkiravargalukko Veettaik Kattugiravargalaal, Thallappatta Piradhaana Moolaikkallaagiya Andhak Kal Idarudharkedhuvaana Kallum Vizhudharkedhuvaana Kanmalaiyumaayitru;
8 avargal Thiruvasanaththirku Keezhppadiyaadhavargalaayirundhu Idarugiraargal; Adharkendre Niyamikkappattavargalaayum Irukkiraargal.

9 neengalo, Ungalai Andhagaaraththinindru Thammudaiya Aachchariyamaana Oliyinidaththirku Varavazhaiththavarudaiya Punniyangalai Arivikkumpadikkuth Therindhukollappatta Sandhadhiyaayum, Raajareegamaana Aasaariyakkoottamaayum, Parisuththa Jaadhiyaayum, Avarukkuch Sondhamaana Janamaayum Irukkireergal.

10 munne Neengal Dhevanudaiya Janangalaayirukkavillai, Ippozhudho Avarudaiya Janangalaayirukkireergal; Munne Neengal Irakkam Peraadhavargalaayirundheergal. Ippozhudho Irakkam Petravargalaayirukkireergal.
11 piriyamaanavargale, Anniyargalum Paradhesigalumaayirukkira Neengal Aaththumaavukku Virodhamaaip Porseygira Maamsa Ichchaigalai Vittu Vilagi,

12 purajaadhigal Ungalai Akkiramakkaararendru Virodhamaaip Pesum Vishayaththil, Avargal Ungal Narkiriyaigalaikkandu Avatrinimiththam Sandhippin Naalile Dhevanai Magimaippaduththumpadi Neengal Avargalukkulle Nalnadakkaiyullavargalaai Nadandhukollungal Endru Ungalukkup Puththisollukgiren.
13 neengal Manusharudaiya Kattalaigal Yaavatrirkum Karththarnimiththam Keezhppadiyungal.

14 melaana Adhigaaramulla Raajaavukkaanaalunjari, Theemaiseygiravargalukku Aakkinaiyum Nanmaiseygiravargalukkup Pugazhchchiyum Undaagumpadi Avanaal Anuppappatta Adhigaarigalukkaanaalunjari, Keezhppadiyungal.
15 neengal Nanmaiseygiradhinaale Puththiyeena Manusharudaiya Ariyaamaiyai Adakkuvadhu Dhevanudaiya Siththamaayirukkiradhu.
16 suyaadheenamullavargalaayirundhum Ungal Suyaadheenaththaith Thurkgunaththirku Moodalaagak Kondiraamal, Dhevanukku Adimaigalaayirungal.
17 ellaaraiyum Ganampannungal; Sagodhararidaththil Anbukoorungal; Dhevanukkup Payandhirungal; Raajaavaik Ganampannungal.
18 velaikkaarare, Adhiga Payaththudane Ungal Ejamaangalukkuk Keezhppadindhirungal; Nallavargalukkum Saanthagunamullavargalukkum Maaththiram Alla, Murattukgunamullavargalukkum Keezhppadindhirungal.
19 enenil, Dhevanmel Patrudhalaayirukkira Manachsaatchiyinimiththam Oruvan Aniyaayamaaip Paadupattu Ubaththiravangalaip Porumaiyaaich Sagiththaal Adhuve Pireedhiyaayirukkum.

20 neengal Kutranjeydhu Adikkappadumpodhu Porumaiyode Sagiththaal, Adhinaal Enna Keerththiyundu? Neengal Nanmaiseydhu Paadupadumpodhu Porumaiyode Sagiththaal Adhuve Dhevanukku Munbaagap Pireedhiyaayirukkum.

21 itharkaaga Neengal Azhaikkappattumirukkireergal; Enenil, Kiristhuvum Ungalukkaagap Paadupattu, Neengal Thammudaiya Adichchuvadugalaith Thodarndhuvarumpadi Ungalukku Maadhiriyaip Pinvaiththupponaar.
22 avar Paavanjeyyavillai, Avarudaiya Vaayile Vanjanai Kaanappadavumillai;
23 avar Vaiyappadumpodhu Badhilvaiyaamalum, Paadupadumpodhu Payamuruththaamalum, Niyaayamaaith Theerppuchseygiravarukkuth Thammai Oppuviththaar.
24 naam Paavangalukkuch Seththu, Needhikkup Pizhaiththirukkumpadikku, Avarthaame Thamadhu Sareeraththile Nammudaiya Paavangalaich Siluvaiyinmel Sumandhaar; Avarudaiya Thazhumbugalaal Gunamaaneergal.
25 sidharunda Aatukalaippolirundheergal; Ippozhudho Ungal Aaththumaakkalukku Meypparum Kankaaniyumaanavaridaththil Thiruppappattirukkireergal.
